creator: Mūsā Ibn-Muntašā Ibn-Ḫalīl as-Sīnūbī,
title: ar-Risāla al-mausūma bi-'l-maṭālib al-ilahīya al-maʽmūla fī 'l-ʽaqāʾid al-islāmīya wa-bayān maḏāhib al-ḫilāfīya wa-radduhum bi-'l-adilla al-qawīya
source: Mūsā Ibn-Muntašā Ibn-Ḫalīl as-Sīnūbī,: ar-Risāla al-mausūma bi-'l-maṭālib al-ilahīya al-maʽmūla fī 'l-ʽaqāʾid al-islāmīya wa-bayān maḏāhib al-ḫilāfīya wa-radduhum bi-'l-adilla al-qawīya. Berlin
subject: Außereuropäische Handschriften
